summary: This module provides a comprehensive suite of unit and integration tests for the Stable Diffusion inpainting pipeline, covering a wide range of configurations such as different schedulers, precision modes, model variants, CPU offloading, compilation, batch processing, IP‑adapter usage, and mask handling to ensure correct functionality and reproducibility.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and quality of the Stable Diffusion inpainting feature across development cycles and releases, detecting regressions and confirming that the pipeline operates correctly under diverse runtime settings.
